catalog_info.title: Adapting Short Fiction to Film: Workshop
catalog_info.description: This workshop explores the principles of literary adaptation from short fiction to film. By viewing films and reading their screenplays and the source stories , we will consider what makes for a successful adaptation from print to film. We'll spend the majority of the class critiquing students' adaptations - either the first act of a feature-length script, or a complete short script (under thirty pages).
